thread.title: Flashback to Karl Malone's debut with the Utah Jazz
thread.title_full: Flashback to Karl Malone's debut with the Utah Jazz

title: Flashback to Karl Malone's debut with the Utah Jazz
text:
Flashback to Karl Malone's debut with the Utah Jazz By Jeremiah Jensen and Rod Zundel | Posted Oct 25th, 2015 @ 11:05pm 0  Having trouble viewing the video? Try disabling any ad blocking extensions currently running on your browser. Utah Jazz open regular season, and a flashback to Karl Malone's debut in a Jazz uniform 
SALT LAKE CITY — The Utah Jazz open the 2015-16 NBA season on Wednesday at Detroit, so we thought it would be a good time to look at another Jazz debut — the first game of local legend Karl Malone, who opened his Utah account 30 years ago. 
Click the video above for highlights of the Mailman's first-ever appearance in a Jazz uniform. 
The Jazz start playing for real when they open up the regular season Wednesday at the Detroit Pistons. After the Pistons, Utah will stay east to take on Philadelphia and Indiana. 
After losing four-straight games in the preseason, the Jazz thumped the Nuggets last Thursday to finish 3-4. 
Now they're ready to play games that count. Jeremiah Jensen
